alert.note: Alert for Chaves County Plains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued June 10 at 2:32PM MDT until June 11 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 8 PM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures between 102 and 107 expected Friday. Temperatures between 105 and 110 expected Saturday. * WHERE...Chaves County Plains. * WHEN...For the first Heat Advisory, until 8 PM MDT this evening. For the second Heat Advisory, from 1 PM through 8 PM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.
